The Protectobots:




Hot Spot smiled to his fellow Protectobots, glad to seem them all functioning 
and not a sign of damage from their previous engagement with 
Brotherhood/Predacon/Alliance forces.

"What's the game plan, Spot?" Streetwise asked, stretching an arm that had 
once been near torn off only a few short mega-cycles ago.

"I don't know.  I guess we should report in." the Protectobot leader said 
with a shrug, opening a comm. link with the Maximal leader, Iron Raptor.  
"Iron Raptor, this is Hot Spot, leader of the Maximal gestalt team the 
Protectobots.  We require something to do and also don't have any quarters.  
Think you could point us in the right direction?"
